short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find student discounts automatically at over 1,000 popular retailers and services providers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Student Discount Finder is a browser extension that automatically finds and notifies you of available student discounts as you shop online or browse google.

Student Discount Finderâ€™s API is backed by a database of 1000+ online stores & service providers that offer exclusive discounts to students in USA, UK, Canada & Australia.
